name: Wizards!
description:
Take turns firing spells at your opponents! Will you be the last wizard standing!

2-8 players, pass the controller style local multiplayer

Created by

Brendan Robinson- Terrain/Spells

https://flamboozle.itch.io/

https://micahdebruno.wixsite.com/portfoliowebsite
